title: Internship
content: I'm trying for internships from outside. If I get internship (jan-may) to whom should I say and take permission for doing internship in 8th sem?

comments.body: Yes you can apply outside. It'll be a "off-campus" internship. Once you get an internship go to the placement office in your campus and tell and show them the details, if you want credits.
What was the welcome kit in pes university.
